mdRecord.dcterms:title: 48 Star United States of America Flag
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A 48 Star United States of America flag and stand. This flag was in the Floyd, Virginia Mayor's office while the office was in the Floyd County Courthouse. It was removed when Vernon Harris took office as Mayor and the office was moved out of the Courthouse. The pole and stand were crafted by Dinky Harris.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Flags
Flagpoles
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
